label: A2B_hR18_148_2f_f-001
title: $\beta$-PdCl$_{2}$ Structure
comments:
PdCl$_{2}$ is known to exist in four different structures at ambient pressure (Evers, 2010): \begin{itemize} \item \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B_oP6_58_g_a-001}{orthorhombic $\alpha$-PdCl$_{2}$}, \item \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B_hR18_148_2f_f-001}{rhombohedral $\beta$-PdCl$_{2}$} (this structure), \item \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B_mP6_14_e_a-001}{monoclinic $\gamma$-PdCl$_{2}$}, and \item \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B_mP6_10_mn_bc-001}{monoclinic $\delta$-PdCl$_{2}$}. \end{itemize} ~ \vspace{-.25in} 
 (Dell'Amico, 1996) did the original assessment of the crystal structure of $\beta$-PdCl$_{2}$, but it is difficult to determine the Wyckoff positions from this paper. We relied on (Villars, 2010) for the Wyckoff positions.
